T11dhkprviu:2: asataḥ sapakṣān na nivṛttir ity asapakṣa eva nāstīti cet* /
T11dhkprviu:3: neti saiva nivṛtter nirvṛttiḥ asataḥ katham iṣṭā /
T11dhkprviu:6: bhāvapratiṣedhas tu na saṃbhavatīty askhalitaprajño devānāṃpriyo yas tadviṣayaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ necchati /
T11dhkprviu:11: na cāsann ātmā sattāsādhanavṛtteḥ sandigdhaḥ syāt* /
T11dhkprviu:15: 4: na copagamabalena sapakṣāsapakṣau vyavasthāpya pramāṇapravartanaṃ yuktam* /
T11dhkprviu:24: v1: sidhyet* / anyathā kvacid dṛṣṭe 'bhāvasidhāv api syād evādṛṣṭe saṃśayaḥ /
T11dhkprviu:25: tathā hy asakalavyaktibhedavyāpino 'py arthāḥ kecit tajjātisaṃbhavino dṛṣṭāḥ pārthivālohalekhyavat* /
T11dhkprviu:29: ātmapratiniyame hi tatkāryātmatayā prāṇādīnāṃ nairātmyena saha virodhaḥ
T11dhkprviu:30: 3: syāt* / sa ca na sidhyatīty uktam* /
T11dhkprviu:31: astu nāma nirātmakebhyo vyatirekaḥ prāṇādīnāṃ tadbhāve ca nairātmyavyāvṛttiḥ /
